CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV escorts MOT , CHI and CHI's father into room . CHI starts to play with the jack+in+the+box
INV leaves the room with CHI's father
CHI watches INV and CHI's father leave
the tape is inaudible during the above
MOT is sitting in chair and looks around the room
CHI picks up ball off of the floor
CHI holds the ball and looks down at it
MOT stretches out her arms and lifts her legs off of the floor looking at CHI
CHI turns and looks at MOT
<$=2> MOT leans back in her chair and opens her arms out wide
CHI holds the ball up as if to throw it and looks at MOT
MOT looks at CHI with her hands open
MOT catches ball and bounces it up
CHI takes a few steps backwards
MOT holds out the ball to CHI cupping her hands
CHI points to jack+in+the+box lying on the floor and walks over to it
MOT motions to the jack+in+the+box with a wave of her hand
MOT leans down over CHI and looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT leans back in her chair watching CHI
CHI pushes down on the lid
CHI twice smacks lid with his hand
CHI attempts to turn jack+in+the+box handle
<1-7> MOT points to table . < .7- .9> MOT looks at CHI
CHI turns around and looks at table
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box and starts to walk over to table
CHI trips over toys lying on the floor
CHI pushes clown into jack+in+the+box and starts to close lid
MOT is watching CHI at table
MOT is out of camera view
MOT leans over and looks at the clown
MOT looks at the clown briefly
<$=1> MOT holds clown out in front of CHI and shakes it
CHI looks down at the floor
MOT puts jack+in+the+box back on table
<aft> MOT pushes the clown in the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns and looks at the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns and reaches for something on the floor
MOT tries to push lid down harder
CHI leans over and picks the toy car up off of the floor
MOT gets up out of the chair and leans over jack+in+the+box on table
CHI turns and looks at MOT holding the toy car in his hand
MOT turns to CHI and with her arms spread open
MOT walks away and sits in the chair
CHI puts the toy car on the table
MOT is watching CHI at table
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI looks down at the toy car
CHI looks at MOT then back at the car
MOT leans forward in her chair
MOT picks up football from off of the desk next to her chair
MOT gets up and walks over to table then kneels beside CHI
MOT moves jack+in+the+box out of the way then taps the toy car hood
CHI looks down at the car
MOT looks closely at car . <6-7> MOT looks up at CHI
CHI hits the car with his hand
CHI looks down at the car
<1> MOT points to the car . MOT nods
CHI rolls car along the table
<aft> MOT picks up rubber duck from off of floor then squeezes it
the dolls and doggie present in the sequence below refers to Fisher Price toys which are usually not presEnt in the warm-up activity

CHI points to something out of camera view

the dog falls out of CHI's hand and rolls across the table to his lap
<aft> MOT picks doll up off of the floor
<aft> MOT grabs the car and drags it closer to her
MOT tries to put doll in the car's rumble seat
MOT looks closely at the car

MOT points to doll on table
CHI looks at the dog doll

CHI points to dog doll sitting on table next to car and looks up at MOT

CHI moves the dolls on the table

MOT moves the duck all over the table

<bef> MOT puts the back on the floor
MOT spreads her hands out wide

CHI stands holding the football up
CHI lowers the football and puts it in his other hand
MOT shakes her hands in the air
MOT holds out her hands with the football in front of CHI
both the top half of CHI and MOT are out of camera view

CHI takes a step towards the door
CHI looks down at the floor
<bef> MOT puts the football on her lap then claps her hands twice

<$=1> MOT points to the book on the chair
MOT watches CHI then looks down at her wrist
a variety of activities intervene at this point that are out of the room altogether . finally , MOT CHI and INV re-enter the room
INV explains four PCI Activities to MOT
CHI walks over to carton of juice lying next to the wall
MOT turns to look at CHI
MOT lays box with ball on top of the table
juice slips out of CHI's hands
